INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of decrease of the effect of the ulipristal, due to increase of its hepatic metabolism by the inducer
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Choose a therapeutic alternative that is little or not at all metabolized.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of decrease of the effect of the ulipristal, due to decrease of its absorption
Risk of decrease of the effect of the ulipristal, due to decrease of its absorption
Risk of antagonism of the effects of the progestin
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Do not take a progestin treatment fewer than 12 hours after stopping the ulipristal.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of antagonism of the effects of the estrogen-progestin contraceptive
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Use an additional contraceptive method of the barrier type for several days after the ulipristal is stopped
